languages.text: {n}Великан с интересом смеривает вас взглядом.{/n} "Славно молвишь. Слова эти книжные я не раз уже слыхал, но впервые вижу, чтобы их произносили с такой непоколебимостью во взгляде. Вижу, что ты не просто в них веришь — ты ими живешь. Я таких уважаю, подсоблю тебе. Пусть никто не посмеет молвить, что я свой долг перед Всеотцом позабыл".

traits.locale_text: {n}Великан с интересом смеривает вас взглядом.{/n} "Славно молвишь. Слова эти книжные я не раз уже слыхал, но впервые вижу, чтобы их произносили с такой непоколебимостью во взгляде. Вижу, что ты не просто в них веришь — ты ими живешь. Я таких уважаю, подсоблю тебе. Пусть никто не посмеет молвить, что я свой долг перед Всеотцом позабыл".
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}The giant sizes you up with interest.{/n} "You speak well. I have heard these bookish words many times before, but this is the first time I have heard them spoken with such resolve. I see that you believe in them, that you live by them. I respect that. I will help you. Let no one say that I forgot my duty to the Allfather."
languages.original_text: {n}Великан с интересом смеривает вас взглядом.{/n} "Славно молвишь. Слова эти книжные я не раз уже слыхал, но впервые вижу, чтобы их произносили с такой непоколебимостью во взгляде. Вижу, что ты не просто в них веришь — ты ими живешь. Я таких уважаю, подсоблю тебе. Пусть никто не посмеет молвить, что я свой долг перед Всеотцом позабыл".

I will help you. Let no one say that I forgot my duty to the Allfather."

languages.text: {n}这个大块头饶有兴趣地打量着你。{/n}“你说得很不错。书本上的这些话，我已经听过无数次了，但我还是第一次听到有人以如此坚定的态度说出这些话。看得出来，你相信这些话语，而且把它们当成了人生的信条。我很尊重这一点，我也愿意帮助你。希望不会有人以为我忘记了对全父的职责。”
languages.original_text: {n}The giant sizes you up with interest.{/n} "You speak well. I have heard these bookish words many times before, but this is the first time I have heard them spoken with such resolve. I see that you believe in them, that you live by them. I respect that. I will help you. Let no one say that I forgot my duty to the Allfather."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个大块头饶有兴趣地打量着你。{/n}“你说得很不错。书本上的这些话，我已经听过无数次了，但我还是第一次听到有人以如此坚定的态度说出这些话。看得出来，你并不仅仅是相信这些话语，你是把它们当成了人生的信条。我很尊重这一点，我也愿意帮助你。希望不会有人以为我忘记了对全父的职责。”
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}巨人は興味深そうにこちらを見た。{/n}「あんたは言葉巧みだな。小説のような回りくどい喋り方は以前にも聞いたことがあるが、これほどはっきりと決意を感じられるのは初めてだ。あんたは今の言葉を信じているだけでなく、それに従って生きている。そいつは尊敬に値することだ。あんたを助けてやろう。全知の父の義務を果たすために」
languages.original_text: {n}The giant sizes you up with interest.{/n} "You speak well. I have heard these bookish words many times before, but this is the first time I have heard them spoken with such resolve. I see that you believe in them, that you live by them. I respect that. I will help you. Let no one say that I forgot my duty to the Allfather."

traits.locale_text: {n}巨人は興味深そうにこちらを見た。{/n}「あんたは言葉巧みだな。小説のような回りくどい喋り方は以前にも聞いたことがあるが、これほどはっきりと決意を感じられるのは初めてだ。あんたは今の言葉を信じているだけでなく、それに従って生きている。そいつは尊敬に値することだ。あんたを助けてやろう。全知の父の義務を果たすために」
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}El gigante te mira con interés.{/n} «Habla bien. He oído a mucha gente pronunciar esas palabras, sacadas de los libros, pero es la primera vez que las oigo con esa determinación. Veo que las cree, que vive guiándose por ellas. Lo respeto. Le ayudaré. Que no se diga que he olvidado mi deber hacia el Padre de todas las cosas».
languages.original_text: {n}The giant sizes you up with interest.{/n} "You speak well. I have heard these bookish words many times before, but this is the first time I have heard them spoken with such resolve. I see that you believe in them, that you live by them. I respect that. I will help you. Let no one say that I forgot my duty to the Allfather."

traits.locale_text: {n}El gigante te mira con interés.{/n} «Habla bien. He oído a mucha gente pronunciar esas palabras, sacadas de los libros, pero es la primera vez que las oigo con esa determinación. Ceo que no solo las cree, sino que vive guiándose por ellas. Lo respeto. Le ayudaré. Que no se diga que he olvidado mi deber hacia el Padre de todas las cosas».
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Le géant vous dévisage avec intérêt.{/n} « Vous parlez bien. J'ai souvent entendu ces mots, mais c'est bien la première fois que quelqu'un les prononce devant moi avec autant de détermination. Non seulement vous y croyez dur comme fer, mais vous en avez fait votre philosophie. C'est quelque chose que je respecte. Je vous aiderai. Personne ne pourra dire que j'ai oublié mon devoir envers le Père de Tous. »
languages.original_text: {n}The giant sizes you up with interest.{/n} "You speak well. I have heard these bookish words many times before, but this is the first time I have heard them spoken with such resolve. I see that you believe in them, that you live by them. I respect that. I will help you. Let no one say that I forgot my duty to the Allfather."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le géant vous dévisage avec intérêt.{/n} « Vous parlez bien. J'ai souvent entendu ces mots, mais c'est bien la première fois que quelqu'un les prononce devant moi avec autant de détermination. Non seulement vous y croyez dur comme fer, mais vous en avez fait votre philosophie. C'est quelque chose que je respecte. Je vous aiderai. Personne ne pourra dire que j'ai oublié mon devoir envers le Père de Tous. »
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Der Riese mustert dich interessiert.{/n} "Gut gesprochen. Ich habe diese belesenen Worte schon oft gehört, doch zum ersten Mal wurden sie mit so viel Nachdruck vorgetragen. Ich sehe, Ihr glaubt an sie und lebt sie auch. Das respektiere ich. Ich werde Euch helfen. Niemand soll sagen, ich hätte meine Pflicht gegenüber dem Allvater vergessen."
languages.original_text: {n}The giant sizes you up with interest.{/n} "You speak well. I have heard these bookish words many times before, but this is the first time I have heard them spoken with such resolve. I see that you believe in them, that you live by them. I respect that. I will help you. Let no one say that I forgot my duty to the Allfather."

Ich sehe, Ihr glaubt nicht nur an sie, Ihr lebt sie auch. Das respektiere ich. Ich werde Euch helfen. Niemand soll sagen, ich hätte meine Pflicht gegenüber dem Allvater vergessen."

I have heard these bookish words many times before, but this is the first time I have heard them spoken with such resolve. I see that you believe in them, that you live by them. I respect that. I will help you. Let no one say that I forgot my duty to the Allfather."

languages.text: {n}Dev, seni ilgiyle ölçüp tartıyor.{/n} "Güzel konuşuyorsun. Kitaplara layık bu sözler, daha önce pek çok defa kulağıma çalındı lakin ilk defa böyle bir kararlılıkla dillendirildiklerini işitiyorum. Onlara inanıp onlara göre yaşadığını görüyorum. Buna saygı duyarım. Sana yardım edeceğim. Tek bir kişi bile Yücebaba'ya karşı görevimi unuttuğumu söyleyemesin."
languages.original_text: {n}The giant sizes you up with interest.{/n} "You speak well. I have heard these bookish words many times before, but this is the first time I have heard them spoken with such resolve. I see that you believe in them, that you live by them. I respect that. I will help you. Let no one say that I forgot my duty to the Allfather."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dev, seni ilgiyle ölçüp tartıyor.{/n} "Güzel konuşuyorsun. Kitaplara layık bu sözler, daha önce pek çok defa kulağıma çalındı lakin ilk defa böyle bir kararlılıkla dillendirildiklerini işittim. Onlara inandığını, onlara göre yaşadığını görüyorum. Buna saygı duyarım. Sana yardım edeceğim. Tek bir kişi bile Yücebaba'ya karşı görevimi unuttuğumu söyleyemesin."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
